== Thazhecode (CT) (627428) ==

Thazhecode (CT) is a town in the [[Kozhikode]] taluka of [[Kozhikode]] district with an area of 19.73 sq. km. and harbouring 5668 households with total population of 25116 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kozhikode]] is at a distance of 30 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 445 km. Male population is 12080 and female population is 13036. Scheduled Caste population is 3949 and Scheduled Tribes population is 55. Census Location Code of the town is 627428<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 30 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 30 km. Railway station is at Kozhikode at a distance of 30 km.
